title: Psalm of Logistical Smallness
description: A psalm of witness written from within constrained systems, naming the moral compression, righteous indignation, and quiet dignity that arise when human scale exceeds logistical frameworks. A record of restrained anger, prophetic observation, and compassion held under pressure during the Dom period.
author: Aleksandr
